item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The Dow Industrials fell on Thursday, dropping more than 200 points after a sharp reversal in the session. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Fr...

item.title: American Express is on the verge of confirming a dreaded double-top pattern, charts show
item.description: A pullback has changed the complexion of this chart, which now appears to be a classic example of a double-top pattern, says David Keller.

item.title: This semiconductor play with a solid dividend ‘gets no respect’ but could be due for upside
item.description: Qualcomm has sat out the big rally in chips, but the stock has growth potential – and it pays out income.

item.title: Buy the dip on this 'pure play automation' stock, says Bank of America
item.description: Shares have gained about 6% so far in 2025.

item.title: China trade talks with rolling deadlines have one big beneficiary: air freight
item.description: The uncertainty of the Trump Administration's ongoing trade talks with China, which have spurred multiple "deadlines," has fueled airfreight traffic.
